somber_beauty.name: Somber Beauty
somber_beauty.town_text: It's as beautiful as it gets out there... enjoy it.
somber_beauty.description: It's as beautiful as it gets out there... enjoy it.

constraints.notes: Apply a 10% bonus to all rewards only if the tracked raid time exceeds 45 minutes.

weeping_skies.name: Weeping Skies
weeping_skies.town_text: A nasty storm approaches, act fast.
weeping_skies.description: A nasty storm approaches, act fast.

constraints.notes: Apply a 10% bonus to all rewards only if the raid is completed in under 25 minutes.

hostile_wasteland.name: Hostile Wasteland
hostile_wasteland.town_text: Lots of enemy patrols... Good luck wanderer.
hostile_wasteland.description: Lots of enemy patrols... Good luck wanderer.

ambush.notes: Ambushes can only start after the first 5 minutes and then can occur randomly with at least 5 minutes between ambush checks.

threat.notes: Clamp raid threat to maximum level for this raid.

constraints.notes: All logic is fully automatable via internal raid timer, ambush system and threat value.

lonely_roads.name: Lonely Roads
lonely_roads.town_text: It's empty out there, should be an easy out.
lonely_roads.description: It's empty out there, should be an easy out.

extraction.notes: When generating extraction points, roll within this range instead of the normal values.

watching_eyes.name: Watching Eyes
watching_eyes.town_text: We're being watched, better not lead them back here...
watching_eyes.description: We're being watched, better not lead them back here...

extraction.notes: Exactly 2 extraction points should be generated.

sos_flare.notes: SoS flare cannot be used this raid.

constraints.notes: Extraction generation and SoS logic can be fully enforced by the app.

spicy_sieverts.name: Spicy Sieverts
spicy_sieverts.town_text: It's baking out there... won't last long...
spicy_sieverts.description: It's baking out there... won't last long...

timer.notes: If the raid timer passes 15 minutes, the raid is considered a failure.

constraints.notes: The app can show/track the 15-minute limit, but the player must honor-mark the raid as failed if they exceed it.

wasteland_in_need.name: Wasteland in Need
wasteland_in_need.town_text: Word is a lot of wastelanders are in need of aid out there.
wasteland_in_need.description: Word is a lot of wastelanders are in need of aid out there.

emergency_tasks.notes: Guarantee at least 1 emergency task, up to 3. Each emergency task completed grants +10% to its own rewards.

constraints.notes: Emergency tasks outside this modifier behave normally; this only guarantees spawns and applies the bonus to those tasks' rewards.

darkness_falls.name: Darkness Falls
darkness_falls.town_text: It's getting dark and dangerous... time to move.
darkness_falls.description: It's getting dark and dangerous... time to move.

threat.notes: Clamp raid threat to maximum level for this raid.

constraints.notes: Player must start the raid at night (honor system). Threat forcing is handled by the app; night condition cannot be auto-verified.

fortunes_bounty.name: Fortune's Bounty
fortunes_bounty.town_text: Fortune smiles on you... for now.
fortunes_bounty.description: Fortune smiles on you... for now.

loot_quality.notes: Use the existing Fortune/rarity tuning system to bias all rewards toward higher rarity tiers.

constraints.notes: Purely handled via the app's loot/rarity curves. No player self-enforcement required.

emergency_task_templates.description: Sweep the area and keep hostiles from overrunning the route.
Recover anything useful before the caravan moves on.
Grab quick readings and mark the worst hotspots.
Secure a small supply cache before someone else does.
